dataList.content: While the others were busy exchanging greetings, Vergilius called me over to a secluded corner.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Let me warn you in advance that the guides are only Grade 8 Fixers.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: ... It means they’re low-rank drudges, errands being their main tasks.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Put them to use, but don’t rely on them.
<In other words, they're not dependable enough.>
I nodded to let him know that I understood his point.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: ... You might be the only one on the bus I can talk to in any meaningful way.
Vergilius gave my shoulder a pat with a crooked smile, then slowly made his way back to the bus.
